health_discussed_people_names: Honourable Bernard Ogutu, Hon. Abdirahman Abdulkadir, Hon. Hassan Mohamed, Hon. Katana, Hon. Pamela Arwa, Hon. Orwa Ojala, Hon. Swaleh Kibwana
health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions about Ward Development Fund, health task force, and addressing health challenges within the county. Mention of the importance of revenue collection and employment opportunities for the youth.
health_data_challenges: Issues of development in certain wards, lack of progress in healthcare services, and concerns about child health services and education funding.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Establishment of a health task force, improvement of healthcare services in underdeveloped wards, and addressing revenue collection challenges.
health_evidence_base: Anecdotal evidence and observations about the current state of health services in the county
